name: Cubinator 3000
description:
DESCRIPTION

You have to kill all enemies in the level to win. You can collect powerups, you can move on top of ramps, and more.  The game is 100% possible! Please read the bugs if you want to play it.

BACKSTORY

This is the 1st game that I have ever made. It's really buggy, but still really fun! I planned to make a boss level, but the code was just too messy. I have to admit... I gave up. But I have started a new, better project. This game is just the beginning.

TIPS

You can play this  game solo, or you can invite a friend, so that one of you shoots, and the other one moves. Try to move closer to an enemy to get a critical hit. You must constantly move, because if you don't, the yellow cube will probably kill you.  And keep in mind that your rockets disappear after some time, so you cant snipe. Also, this game is hard.

BUGS

WARNING: This game is really buggy: enemies can spawn on top of you, enemies are stupid and can get stuck, the numbers on the powerups can glitch out, powerups stack and there can be a lot of them when you pick them up... There is also a bug where you do 2 damage instead of 1, but I have accepted this bug as a critical hit mechanic (it seems to be activated mostly when you are really close to an enemy).
